EmailTemplate.name: FPR Discussion Required Email
EmailTemplate.subject: IMPORTANT: FPR {!PubReviewTeam__c.Publication__c} Requires Discussion
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Do not reply to this email message.
FPR {!PubReviewTeam__c.PubIDLink__c} requires additional discussion. To expedite the process contact {!PubReviewTeam__c.Reviewer__c} to address their concerns. Contact the FPR coordinator, {!PubReviewTeam__c.AssignedFPRCFF__c}, if you have questions or need support.
{!PubReviewTeam__c.PubIDLink__c}
Thank you,
FPR System
